column4: was wondering about a nice lanchat and I was told to look at Bonjour in pidgin and I have my ubuntu box already and when I try to set my wifes lappy it doesnt work? is there another way?
haha no when she is in the back room, and besides I like to try new things instead of just gaming all the time
if it were me, i'd just run an ircd on my machine and tell my friends to connect to 192.168.15.101 (or whatever)
